verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come and rejoice with me! For once my heart was poor, And I have found a treasury Of love, a boundless store.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come and rejoice with me! I, once so sick at heart, Have met with One who knows my case, And knows the healing art.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come and rejoice with me! For I was wearied sore, And I have found a mighty arm Which holds me evermore.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come and rejoice with me! My feet so wide did roam, And One has brought me from afar, To find in Him my home.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Come and rejoice with me! For I have found a Friend Who knows my heartâ€™s most secret depths, Yet loves me without end.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: I knew not of His love; And He had loved so long, With love so faithful and so deep, So tender and so strong.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And now I know it all, Have heard and known His voice, And hear it still from day to day. Can I enough rejoice?
